tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamTasks (
    task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    assignee_id INT,
    deadline TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
)

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    deadline TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    assigned_to VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_manager VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE task_comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID REFERENCES team_tasks(task_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(100),
    comment_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    project_start_date DATE,
    project_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_assigned_to INT REFERENCES TeamMembers(member_id),
    task_project_id INT REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
    task_deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TaskProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT REFERENCES Tasks(task_id),
    status_id INT REFERENCES TaskStatus(status_id),
    progress_date DATE,
    progress_notes TEXT
);
